ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Generates a simple Ternary Polygon Chart in code
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Generates a Ternary Polygon chart in code. The TernaryPolygonRenderableSeries can be used to render an [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.XyzDataSeries%601.html']XyzDataSeries[/url].
Polygons are rendered using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.BaseRenderableSeries~Stroke.html']Stroke[/url] (outline) and Fill (fill).
